questions.question: What is Frank Ocean’s birth name?
correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: Frank Ocean was born as Christopher Edwin Breaux on October 28, 1987. He later adopted the stage name 'Frank Ocean' for his music career.

questions.question: In which year did Frank Ocean join the hip hop collective Odd Future?
correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: Frank Ocean joined the hip hop collective Odd Future in 2010, which helped him gain more exposure in the music industry.

questions.question: What is the title of Frank Ocean's first mixtape?
correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: Frank Ocean released his first mixtape, Nostalgia, Ultra, in 2011. This mixtape garnered critical acclaim and helped him secure a recording contract with Def Jam Recordings.

questions.question: Which record label did Frank Ocean sign with after releasing Nostalgia, Ultra?
correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: After the release of Nostalgia, Ultra, Frank Ocean signed a recording contract with Def Jam Recordings, a prominent American record label.

questions.question: What musical styles does Channel Orange incorporate?
correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: Channel Orange, Frank Ocean's first studio album, incorporates R&B and soul styles, showcasing his eclectic musical influences.

questions.question: How many Grammy Awards has Frank Ocean won?
correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: Frank Ocean has won two Grammy Awards, including Best Urban Contemporary Album for Channel Orange.

questions.question: In which year did Time name Frank Ocean as one of the world's most influential people?
correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: Time magazine named Frank Ocean as one of the world's most influential people in 2013, recognizing his impact on the music industry.

questions.question: What is the title of Frank Ocean's visual album released in 2016?
correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: Frank Ocean released a visual album titled Endless in 2016 to fulfill contractual obligations with Def Jam Recordings.

questions.question: Which album ranked first on Pitchfork's list of the best albums of the 2010s decade?
correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: Frank Ocean's second studio album, Blonde, ranked first on Pitchfork's list of the best albums of the 2010s decade, showcasing his continued musical innovation.

correct_feedback: I couldn’t have done it better myself.
wrong_feedback: Don’t worry, you’ll get the next one.
questions.fact: Frank Ocean launched a fashion brand called Homer, expanding his creative pursuits beyond music.
